msg: README -> README.rdoc.  Works better for Github.

author: assaf
msg: Development environment now using RSpec gems, no longer installing plugins; specified as rspec-rails (rspec is a dependency) and upgraded to 1.1.8.
Gems that are only used during development/testing by Rake tasks or seaprate commands (e.g. spec, thin) are no longer loaded by default.

author: assaf
msg: Upgraded to RSpec 1.1.8 using rspec-rails gem instead of plugin
